pli-tv-bu-vb-pc72:1.1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc72:1.1.2: Tena kho pana samayena bhagavā bhikkhūnaṃ anekapariyāyena vinayakathaṃ katheti, vinayassa vaṇṇaṃ bhāsati, vinayapariyattiyā vaṇṇaṃ bhāsati, ādissa ādissa āyasmato upālissa vaṇṇaṃ bhāsati.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc72:1.1.4: “bhagavā kho anekapariyāyena vinayakathaṃ katheti, vinayassa vaṇṇaṃ bhāsati, vinayapariyattiyā vaṇṇaṃ bhāsati, ādissa ādissa āyasmato upālissa vaṇṇaṃ bhāsati.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc72:1.1.5: Handa mayaṃ, āvuso, āyasmato upālissa santike vinayaṃ pariyāpuṇāmā”ti, te ca bahū bhikkhū therā ca navā ca majjhimā ca āyasmato upālissa santike vinayaṃ pariyāpuṇanti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc72:1.1.7: “etarahi kho, āvuso, bahū bhikkhū therā ca navā ca majjhimā ca āyasmato upālissa santike vinayaṃ pariyāpuṇanti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc72:1.1.8: Sace ime vinaye pakataññuno bhavissanti amhe yenicchakaṃ yadicchakaṃ yāvadicchakaṃ ākaḍḍhissanti parikaḍḍhissanti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc72:1.1.10: Atha kho chabbaggiyā bhikkhū bhikkhū upasaṅkamitvā evaṃ vadanti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc72:1.1.11: “kiṃ panimehi khuddānukhuddakehi sikkhāpadehi uddiṭṭhehi, yāvadeva kukkuccāya vihesāya vilekhāya saṃvattantī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc72:1.1.14: “kathañhi nāma chabbaggiyā bhikkhū vinayaṃ vivaṇṇessantī”ti … pe …
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc72:1.1.18: kathañhi nāma tumhe, moghapurisā, vinayaṃ vivaṇṇessatha.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc72:1.1.19: Netaṃ, moghapurisā, appasannānaṃ vā pasādāya … pe …
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc72:1.1.20: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc72:1.1.21: “Yo pana bhikkhu pātimokkhe uddissamāne evaṃ vadeyya—‘kiṃ panimehi khuddānukhuddakehi sikkhāpadehi uddiṭṭhehi, yāvadeva kukkuccāya vihesāya vilekhāya saṃvattantī’ti, sikkhāpadavivaṇṇake pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc72:2.1.7: uddisante vā uddisāpente vā sajjhāyaṃ vā karonte.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc72:2.1.9: “kiṃ panimehi khuddānukhuddakehi sikkhāpadehi uddiṭṭhehi, yāvadeva kukkuccāya vihesāya vilekhāya saṃvattantī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc72:2.1.10: “Ye imaṃ pariyāpuṇanti tesaṃ kukkuccaṃ hoti, vihesā hoti, vilekhā hoti, ye imaṃ na pariyāpuṇanti tesaṃ kukkuccaṃ na hoti vihesā na hoti vilekhā na hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc72:2.1.11: Anuddiṭṭhaṃ idaṃ varaṃ, anuggahitaṃ idaṃ varaṃ, apariyāpuṭaṃ idaṃ varaṃ, adhāritaṃ idaṃ varaṃ, vinayo vā antaradhāyatu, ime vā bhikkhū appakataññuno hontū”ti upasampannassa vinayaṃ vivaṇṇeti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc72:2.2.1: Upasampanne upasampannasaññī vinayaṃ vivaṇṇeti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc72:2.2.2: Upasampanne vematiko vinayaṃ vivaṇṇeti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc72:2.2.3: Upasampanne anupasampannasaññī vinayaṃ vivaṇṇeti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc72:2.2.5: Anupasampannassa vinayaṃ vā aññaṃ vā dhammaṃ vivaṇṇeti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc72:2.3.2: na vivaṇṇetukāmo, “iṅgha tvaṃ suttante vā gāthāyo vā abhidhammaṃ vā pariyāpuṇassu, pacchā vinayaṃ pariyāpuṇissasī”ti bhaṇati, ummattakassa, ādikammikassāti.
